creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: front view of a temple entrance: wooden temple gate with moss-covered tile roof; lanterns; two figures just inside at L; view of garden and blossoming tree inside; outside is the front wall and stone bridge
marks: left: 自摺　昭和八年作　文之助茶屋 {jizuri, Shōwa hachinen saku, LLC: よし田 {Yoshida}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: The Gate to Bunnosuke Teahouse
